resources.string: Welcome to the pack! At Lucky Paws, we believe dogs love socialization and freedom as much as you do! That is why we offer all-day daycare and daycare inclusive boarding. Whether your dog is here for the day while you\'re at work or a week while you\'re on vacation, you can relax knowing your dog is having the time of it\'s life. Use this app to watch your beloved pooch playing with his friends right on your phone via our live webcam! And now, it\'s easier than ever to make reservations or check pricing from your mobile device.
